pages.text: $(item)Shulker Boxes$() are portable $(item)Chests$(): they keep their items when broken, which can be retrieved when placed again. $(br2)This is different from other containers, which drop their contained items as item entities when broken. $(br2)These boxes are made out of $(item)Shulker Shells$() that are dropped by $(item)Shulkers$() in The End.
